item.title: RSL Speedwoofer 12S Powered Subwoofer
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker. It is not intended to be a deep dive. More so, this is information for those who prefer “just the facts” and prefer to have the data without the filler.

item.title: Monoprice THX-365C Center Channel Speaker Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

This speaker was loaned to me by a viewer.

The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker. It is not intended to be a deep dive. Moreso, this is information for those who prefer “just the facts” and prefer to have the data without the filler. The video below has more discussion with respect to the technical merits and subjective notes I had during my listening sessions.

The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker. Due to time constraints and lack of personal interest, this review is a shortened version of what I typically provide.

item.title: Monoprice MM-3 Powered Monitor Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker. Due to time constraints and lack of personal interest, this review is a shortened version of what I typically provide. However, note that I initially tested this speaker with the port open. I then decided to test with the port sealed and - given the vast improvement in performance - decided to provide the rest of the data/review with the speaker’s ports blocked. I used foam to stuff the ports.
